LanguageData.Pa_XM109AMPR.label: Barrett XM109 AMPR
LanguageData.Pa_XM109AMPR.description: Originally belong to the OSW program, it become AMPR thanks to it role, the XM109 can be reconfigured to use both .50 BMG and 25X59mm high-velocity grenade round for light-medium armored target, unlike the M82/M107 system, the XM109 offers greater range with a shorter weapon length. Very high damage, extremely long range and excellent accuracy.
